name: BTDFRedeployTask
description: Deployment Framework for BizTalk btdfproj project target: Redeploy
author: Jason Vercellone and Fr√©deric Cordier

inputs.name: Environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The BTDF environment name, used as a prefix to the settings file name (i.e. '{0}settings.xml')

inputs.name: BTDeployMgmtDB
inputs.label: Deploy Mgmt DB
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean DeployBizTalkMgmtDB MSBuild property setting used when building the BTDF project (*.btdfproj). Is ignored when quick deploy is selected.

inputs.name: ProgramFilesDir
inputs.label: Program Files Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Program Files Folder, if different from the system default.

inputs.name: ProgramName
inputs.label: Product Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Installed product name, if different from the BizTalk application name.
